title: Cenx's set
info: Cenx's set is a vanity developer item set that can be obtained rarely (5% chance) from Treasure Bags in Expert Mode. It is one of two vanity sets made for Cenx, the Creative Director on Terraria. Equipping the full set produces pink glowing particles when the player is near a light source.
stat:
Type
VanitySet
Tooltip'Great for impersonating devs!'
